course.subject: ENVR
course.name: Life Cycle Assessment
course.description: Smart and sustainable solutions are globally on the rise. Product developers, designers, engineers from all sectors use Life Cycle Assessment to use quantitative evidence to proof that their product or innovation is truly more sustainable than existing solutions. Life Cycle Assessment is one of the most commonly used tools to measure the environmental, social and financial cost of a product or system and to allow a fair comparison. In this class students will (1) learn how to assess environmental life cycle impacts and identify options for resource conservation, and pollution prevention; (2) apply methods for Life Cycle Assessment on various products and systems, interpret results and judge the associated uncertainties; (3) interpret and evaluate case examples to gain a deeper understanding of the strengths, weaknesses and appropriate use of Life Cycle Assessment; (4) learn the necessary software basics to perform a moderately complex LCA under supervision.

reviews.author: Dan1
reviews.comment_content: You learn about doing Life Cycle assessment, from the different types to the software usage and the recommendations.
reviews.comment_teaching:
Meike is amazing as a proffesor, she makes sure that everyone understands and constantly gives examples so you can relate to the topic easily, I would totally recommend it.
The powerpoints have all the information you need to study on your own if necessary, also she is always available through the email.
reviews.comment_grading: she is fair with the notes as far as you complete what she asks in the excersise you will get a good grade.
reviews.comment_workload: you have one project and 2 different homeworks, really doable and nice to learn in practice how to do LCA

reviews.author: chenxiaoxiao
reviews.comment_content: GOOD, can learn a lot during the class, very useful if you want to do the life cycle assessment in your future career. In the class some good cases studies will be introduced so is quite useful. After taking the class, I can do the LCA studies for different industry independently and I love it.
reviews.comment_teaching: professional, she will prepare well and can teaching the LCA knowledge comprehensively.
reviews.comment_grading: good, if works hard, the score will be good. Final project will be important for the final grade.

reviews.author: ABC 123
reviews.title: Nice course with high workload
reviews.comment_content: Nice and practical content to help students understand how LCA work in the real business. That would be a very good course if you aims at being an environmental consultant.
reviews.comment_teaching: Responsive professor with constructive and detailed comments in how to improve your analysis. You can really learn sth from the course.
reviews.comment_grading: Not too bad, I am above mean in most assignment and get a B+
reviews.comment_workload: One of the most time-consuming course i have taken in UST. As everyone is trying to write as much as possible, it makes every assignment like a group project. If you take the course, you better dun overload in this semester lol
